question: As per the recently released report by Global Alliance on Health and Pollution, which country saw the most deaths due to pollution?
explanation: As per the new report “2019 Pollution and Health Metrics: Global, Regional and Country Analysis” released by the Global Alliance on Health and Pollution (GHAP), India saw the highest number of deaths in 2017 due to pollution. In this list, India is followed by China and Nigeria. USA, the third most populous nation is 7<sup>th</sup> in this list.
